description: Yelp Fusion API provides access to business search, reviews, ratings, and local business information with rich data for location-based services

tools.name: YELP_GET_BUSINESS_DETAILS
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific business on Yelp using its business ID or alias. Returns comprehensive business information including hours, photos, reviews, and location details.

locale.title: Locale
locale.description: Locale for the business details. Defaults to en_US.

business_id.title: Business Id
business_id.description: Yelp business ID or alias. Can be the unique ID or the business alias from search results.

tools.name: YELP_GET_BUSINESS_REVIEWS
tools.description: Get reviews for a specific business on Yelp using its business ID or alias. Returns up to 3 review excerpts for the business.

locale.title: Locale
locale.description: Locale for the reviews. Defaults to en_US.

sort_by.title: Sort By
sort_by.description: Sort reviews by: yelp_sort (default), newest, or oldest.

business_id.title: Business Id
business_id.description: Yelp business ID or alias. Can be the unique ID or the business alias from search results.

tools.name: YELP_GET_REVIEW_HIGHLIGHTS
tools.description: Get review highlights for a specific business on Yelp using its business ID or alias. Returns summarized key points and themes from customer reviews.

count.title: Count
count.description: Number of review highlights to return. Maximum is 10.

business_id.title: Business Id
business_id.description: Yelp business ID or alias. Can be the unique ID or the business alias from search results.

tools.name: YELP_SEARCH_AND_CHAT
tools.description: Chat with Yelp's AI assistant to search restaurants, check for availability, and make reservations.

query.title: Query
examples: Find me the best Italian restaurants near Times Square
What are some good coffee shops open now?
query.description: The user's query or question to ask the AI chat assistant about businesses, locations, or Yelp-related information.

chat_id.title: Chat Id
chat_id.description: Unique identifier for the chat session. Helps maintain context and continuity across multiple queries in the same conversation.

tools.name: YELP_SEARCH_BUSINESSES
tools.description: Search for businesses on Yelp by location, term, categories, and other filters. This is the main search endpoint for finding businesses.

term.title: Term
term.description: Search term (e.g. food, restaurants, bars, etc.). If not provided, will search for all businesses.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Number of businesses to return. Maximum is 50.

locale.title: Locale
locale.description: Locale for the search results. Defaults to en_US.

offset.title: Offset
offset.description: Offset for pagination. Used to get more results beyond the limit.

radius.title: Radius
radius.description: Search radius in meters. Maximum is 40000 meters (25 miles).

open_at.title: Open At
open_at.description: Filter for businesses open at a specific Unix timestamp.

sort_by.title: Sort By
sort_by.description: Sort businesses by: best_match, rating, review_count, or distance.

latitude.title: Latitude
latitude.description: Latitude coordinate for search location. Use with longitude.

location.title: Location
location.description: Location to search for businesses. Can be an address, city, state, zip code, or latitude,longitude coordinates.

open_now.title: Open Now
open_now.description: Filter for businesses that are open now.

longitude.title: Longitude
longitude.description: Longitude coordinate for search location. Use with latitude.

attributes.title: Attributes
attributes.description: Additional filters. Comma-separated list of attributes.

categories.title: Categories
categories.description: Categories to filter by. Comma-separated list of category aliases.

tools.name: YELP_SEARCH_BY_PHONE
tools.description: Search for a business by phone number on Yelp. This endpoint allows you to find businesses using their phone number.

phone.title: Phone
phone.description: Phone number to search for. Can include country code (+1 for US) or just the number.
